short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize and Bookmark tabs, notes, and to-dos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Docket: Simplify your life by organizing bookmarks, notes, and tasks with customizable themes.

Description: With Docket, managing bookmarks and notes is a breeze. Designed with a clean aesthetic and flexible layout, this free tool helps you categorize your bookmarks and jot down ideas efficiently using drag-and-drop functionality.

Key Features:
ðŸ’  Dark and Light Themes: Easily toggle between themes for your convenience
ðŸ’  Import Existing Bookmarks: Quickly bring in your existing bookmarks with ease
ðŸ’  Folder Organization: Create folders to categorize and manage different bookmark types
ðŸ’  Kanban-Style Boards: Organize bookmarks and notes in a visually appealing layout
ðŸ’  Active Tabs Management: Save links from active tabs with simple drag-and-drop actions
ðŸ’  Sticky Notes: Quickly jot down ideas and plans in a user-friendly environment

No signup is necessary, and your data is securely stored in your browser's local storage, ensuring privacy and control over your information.
